mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_SEQ_MAIN SET SEQDESC=#{seqdesc} WHERE SEQKEY=#{seqkey}
UPDATE SYS_SEQ_VALUE SET SEQVALUE=#{seqvalue} WHERE SEQKEY=#{seqkey} AND SEQOWNER=#{seqowner}
mapper.select: SELECT (CASE WHEN A.SEQTYPE='1' THEN A.SEQTYPEVALUE WHEN A.SEQTYPE='2' THEN (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,A.SEQTYPEVALUE) FROM DUAL) WHEN A.SEQTYPE='3' THEN (SELECT LPAD(${seqvalue},A.SEQTYPEVALUE,'0') FROM DUAL) END) "itemValue" FROM SYS_SEQ_SETTING A WHERE A.SEQKEY=#{seqkey} ORDER BY A.SEQORDER ASC
